title.rendered: SEO Plans and Pricing – How Much Companies Charging For SEO

content.rendered:
Search optimization is broad and companies charge hundreds and thousands of dollars to optimize a website on given keywords. You will find companies charging $5000 per month or even more for performing basic on-page and off-page SEO for your website. 

The SEO plans and pricing depends on various factors including the current domain authority, website size, number of keywords, type of website, and more. If you are run an enterprise business, then companies charge anywhere between $2,000 to $10,000 per month for optimizing your website. On the other hand, if you own an eCommerce business, then you must plan your budget around $5,000 to $15,000 per month to boost your website’s organic traffic and sales. 

If you run a local business that targets customers from your and nearby area, then you need to have a local SEO plans and pricing. The local business optimization can cost you anywhere from $1,000 to $3,000 per month and companies also have additional charges for content creation and other additional activities. 

SEO is an ongoing process and it takes three months to 6 months and even more in some cases to rank on desired keywords. It’s the main reason why SEO is expensive when you hire companies that charge on an hourly or per-project basis. 

If you have just started your business, then you need to have a search optimization strategy for your website to gain traction from the targeted audience. 

For helping business owners from all over multiple industries, EZ Rankings brings in quality and performance-driven SEO plans and pricing that help you grow significantly. 

Our SEO Plans and Pricing Help To Grow Your Business

EZ Rankings offers you affordable and performance-driven SEO plans that help your business grow and bring more customers. Our SEO plans and pricing start from $225 per month and go up to $1,125 per month. We cover all important SEO aspects including on-page SEO, off-page SEO, website audit, and more to ensure your website starts ranking on targeted keywords. Our SEO packages give you a complete roadmap of activities that our team is going to perform and bring results. 

If you own an eCommerce business, then we have brought you a full-fledged plan that starts from as low as $450 per month that goes up to $2,399 per month. 

We have result-driven local SEO packages that boost your local business’s website and help you generate more leads in a shorter turnaround time. Our local SEO packages start at $160 per month and go up to $400 per month that covers all local SEO aspects.
